About Me

I am an aspiring user experience designer with a working experience in instructional design and content development. My work experience that are tied with UX are mostly with user research. I have yet to finish a full blown UX project, but I have created web app services through my degree in information systems in college. I proficient in HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript. I have also ventured into user interface design using Adobe XD as part of my journey in UX.

Experience

Education Specialist

2020 - Current

Our task as an education specialist is to review if projects have met company and the Department of Education (DEPED) standards. We are to check if the essential questions and enduring understanding, set by the instructional designers, are relevant to the topic and the target learner. An education specialist also assures that projects are within the deadline.

It is also our job to provide learning resources that is up to trend and aligned with DepEd Standards.
